pkgmetadata.longdescription: Network-Based Regularization for Generalized Linear Models // Network-based regularization has achieved success in variable selection for high-dimensional biological data due to its ability to incorporate correlations among genomic features. This package provides procedures of network-based variable selection for generalized linear models (Ren et al. (2017) doi:10.1186/s12863-017-0495-5 and Ren et al.(2019) doi:10.1002/gepi.22194). Continuous, binary, and survival response are supported. Robust network-based methods are available for continuous and survival responses.
